Index.welcome: Seamlessly Connect to Global Networks with eSIMwallet
Index.welcome2: Enjoy uninterrupted internet on every adventure and save on costly roaming charges.

Verify.verifySuccessMessage: Thank you, your account has been verified successfully. You can start using it now.
Verify.verifyErrorTitle: There was a problem with verifying your account
Verify.verifyErrorUnknown: Unknown error occurred while verifying your account. Reload the page to try again. If error repeats, contact our Customer Support.
Verify.tokenNotFound: We couldn't find an account with this verification token. Please ensure the entire verification link has been pasted from the sent e-mail message.
Verify.tokenNotFound2: It is also possible that the account has been already verified and it's ready to be used.
